Body:
np.random.seed(12345)
y_MC, Uy_MC = MC(x, sigma_noise, b1, [1.0], Ub, runs=2 * runs, blow=b2)
y_UMC, Uy_UMC, _, _, _ = UMC(x, b1, [1.0], Ub, blow=b2, sigma=sigma_noise,
    runs=2 * runs, runs_init=10)
assert np.allclose(y_MC, y_UMC, atol=0.0005)
assert np.allclose(Uy_MC, Uy_UMC, atol=0.0005)
